```{r, include = FALSE}
library(gsheet)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(knitr)
ver <- "2.1"
```


# Ecosystem components
```{r, include = FALSE}
layers <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JIV92XisuBctBoVT53yqj0orPNRVyRQVEDtMq7R0fKw/edit?usp=sharing")
layers <- filter(layers, theme == "Ecosystem")
n <- layers$layer_file_name
raw <- paste0("[Download]", "(https://github.com/WIOSymphony/wiosym/raw/main/products/v", ver, "/output_geotiffs/eco/", n, ".tif)")
layers$raw_link <- raw

layers <- select(layers, title, theme, raw_link)
colnames(layers) <- c("Layer", "Theme", "Download link")
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
kable(layers)
```
